data.additional_notes:
Completed the tutorial and progressed through the high-school segment with consistent performance, maintaining 60 FPS overall. Visually busy areas experienced minor slowdowns (56-60 FPS), but gameplay remained smooth and wouldn't be noticeable.

This game report focused on framerate instead of battery life, settings could be further optimized for longer sessions. Some sections of the game has pop-ups that can only be controlled/clicked with a mouse which can feel a bit funky at times.

Game would crash at 1GB UMA, can be resolved by setting UMA to 4G
